main event: A bright white round object, described as being like a 100 watt bulb, was observed traveling south and then disappearing to the north in Chicago.
interesting points: The object was visible for about 15 minutes and had an apparent altitude of about 20-25 degrees above the horizon., The object's brightness was compared to a 100 watt bulb., Observers noted that the object moved in a straight course and did not leave a trail or produce any sound., The sighting was confirmed by multiple witnesses who remarked on its unusual characteristics compared to normal aircraft., The object disappeared behind a tree, which indicated a sudden end to the sighting.
witness description: two civilians witnessing an ovate, glowing object in the sky
